entity.name: dispensary
entity.query: select d.id, d.name, street, city, state, zip, sundayOpen, sundayClose, mondayOpen, mondayClose, tuesdayOpen, tuesDayClose, wednesdayOpen, wednesdayClose, thursdayOpen, thursdayClose, fridayOpen, fridayClose, saturdayOpen, saturdayClose, dispensaryImageURL from dispensaryentity d
entity.deltaImportQuery: select d.id, d.name, street, city, state, zip, phone, email, website, facebookURL, instagramURL, twitterURL, sundayOpen, sundayClose, mondayOpen, mondayClose, tuesdayOpen, tuesDayClose, wednesdayOpen, wednesdayClose, thursdayOpen, thursdayClose, fridayOpen, fridayClose, saturdayOpen, saturdayClose, dispensaryImageURL from dispensaryentity d where d.id='${dih.delta.id}'
entity.deltaQuery: select id from dispensaryentity where lastUpdateDate > '${dih.last_index_time}'
